title: NK Lesson Citation Graph — K_avg Temporal Tracking
expect: K_avg modestly above S312 (1.028) with uncited pct slightly down as citations accumulate.
method: Scan all memory/lessons/L-*.md for L-NNN citations; build directed graph; compute NK metrics with multi-edge and unique-pair counts.
actual: K_avg=1.003 (multi-edge), K_avg_unique=0.830. 200/359 uncited (55.7%). 0 cycle SCCs. Total citations: 360.
diff: Expectation was slight increase from S312; actual K_avg slipped toward 1.0 and uncited pct ticked up. Knowledge coupling stalled; orphan rate worsened slightly.

interpretation.swarm_implication: Coupling plateaued; retroactive citation annotation remains highest-ROI action to lift K_avg toward 1.5.

f75_connection: K_avg=1.003 < 1.5 threshold — data-parallel still wins; method decomposition not yet favored.
next: Track K_avg at N=400; prioritize retroactive citations to reduce orphan rate and push K_avg toward 1.5.
